articles.title: Apple issues health warning to keep iPhones six inches away from your chest - Daily Mail
articles.description: Apple warns that some of its iPhone, iPad, Beats' headphones and Airpod devices could cause issue for people who have pacemakers and implanted defibrillators.
articles.content:
Apple is warning users who have a pacemaker or other implanted medical device to keep their iPhone at least six inches from their chest.

articles.title: I'm a podiatrist - here's what your feet say about your health - Daily Mail
articles.description: From pesky cracked heels to more serious problems, such as swelling, feet often show signs of disease before any other part of your body, says Emma McConnachie, a podiatrist in Falkirk, Scotland.
articles.content:
You might not think it but your feet can tell you a surprising amount about your health.
